topicTitle: Why exactly does storm have the power to respawn himself?

posts.postText: Yeah.. I actually posted his handywork in the LOLZ thread

He needs to not have his powers.
He abuses commands that nobody else has aside from him. I'm on the verge of banning him.
If anything he needs to have his ability to bypass the anti-cheat gone.
These backdoors should not be in the anticheat and needs to be removed immediately.
